short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Custom background for ChromeOS built-in pages/apps.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
*** 
The `Extensions on chrome:// URLs` flag needs to be enabled for this extension to work. 
***

ChromeOS CustomBack is a Chrome extension which allows you to customize the background for Chrome/ChromeOS built-in pages/apps, here are some apps/pages that work with ChromeOS CustomBack:

- ChromeOS Files App
- ChromeOS Diagnostics App
- Chrome history tab
- Chrome bookmarks tab

***
Changelog is available here:
https://github.com/supechicken/ChromeOS-CustomBack/releases
***
